body:
Hello everyone, 

I'm trying to learn honeybee and ladybug with Chris Mackey tutorial on YouTube

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=92cyBvHPSDs&index=19&list=U...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=92cyBvHPSDs&index=19&list=UUc6HWbF4UtdKdjbZ2tvwiCQ), 

I have the error "1. Solution exception:'Brep' object has no attribute 'Vertices' " with the component **HoneyBee Indoor View Factor Calculator.**

How can I fix it please?

Thanks,

Ilona
topic: HoneyBee Energy Modeling - Object has no attribute error

replies.body:
Hi Ilona,

This error is system specific and doesn't happen on my system but we had a similar issue before which was solved by changing Vertices() to DuplicateVertices(). Can you check the attached file and let me know if it works.

Mostapha
It works, thank you very much!

Thanks for taking care of this, Mostapha.  I am sorry that this example of Brep.Vertictes() slipped through the cracks for me.  I know that I am supposed to use Brep.DuplicateVertices() and I will be sure to double-check this in the future before releasing components.
